cast.overview: David, a robotic boy—the first of his kind programmed to love—is adopted as a test case by a Cybertronics employee and his wife. Though he gradually becomes their child, a series of unexpected circumstances make this life impossible for David.
cast.title: A.I. Artificial Intelligence

details.biography: Hunter Haley King is an American actress. She is known for portraying Adriana Masters on Hollywood Heights, Summer Newman on The Young and the Restless and Clementine Hughes on Life in Pieces. Earlier in her career she was credited as Haley King, but she has since been credited as Hunter King.
details.name: Hunter King
